books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: A former detective becomes the prime suspect in a murder case involving a man with mob ties who was in witness protection.
books.title: SIMPLY LIES

books.author: Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.title: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.title: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.title: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend.
books.title: IT STARTS WITH US

books.author: Ann Napolitano
books.description: In a homage to Louisa May Alcott’s “Little Women,” a young man’s dark past resurfaces as he gets to know the family of his college sweetheart.
books.title: HELLO BEAUTIFUL

books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.title: VERITY

books.author: John Sandford
books.description: The second book in the Letty Davenport series. Letty takes an undercover assignment that puts her in harm’s way with a group of hackers.

books.author: Colleen Hoover and Tarryn Fisher
books.contributor: by Colleen Hoover and Tarryn Fisher
books.description: Questions arise when a pair of lovers try to uncover why they suddenly became strangers.

books.author: Don Winslow
books.description: The second book in the City trilogy. When a movie is made about his former life, Danny Ryan looks for his cut and seeks to restart his criminal empire.
books.title: CITY OF DREAMS

books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A fictional oral history charting the rise and fall of a ’70s rock ’n’ roll band.
books.title: DAISY JONES & THE SIX

books.description: Nine years after being cast out, a young woman returns to reclaim her place in her family and comes into her own as a bootlegger.

books.author: Gabrielle Zevin
books.description: Two friends find their partnership challenged in the world of video game design.
books.title: TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW

books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.title: UGLY LOVE

books.author: David Grann
books.description: The survivors of a shipwrecked British vessel on a secret mission during an imperial war with Spain have different accounts of events.
books.title: THE WAGER

books.contributor: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity.

books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
